articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Yang Hyong Man
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Yang Hyong Man 
   Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a wreath to the bier of Yang Hyong Man, academician, professor and doctor at the State Academy of Sciences, Wednesday, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Chinese Vice-President to Visit DPRK
articles.content:
Chinese Vice-President to Visit DPRK 
   Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- Xi Jinping, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and vice-president of the People's Republic of China, will shortly pay an official goodwill visit to the DPRK at the invitation of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Minister Meets Omani Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Minister Meets Omani Ambassador 
   Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, today met and had a talk with Abdullah Bin Salleh Bin Hilal Al-Saadi, new Omani ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia ofrenda floral al feretro del difunto Yang Hyong Man
   Pyongyang, 4 de junio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente  Kim Jong Il envio el dia 4 una ofrenda floral al feretro del difunto Yang Hyong Man, academico de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, profesor y doctor titulares, en senal de profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

Xi Jinping visitara pronto Corea
   Pyongyang, 5 de junio (ATCC) -- Por invitacion del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Xi Jinping, miembro del Comite Permanente del Buro Politico del CC del Partido Comunista de China y vicepresidente de la Republica Popular China, realizara pronto una visita oficial y de amistad a Corea.
